JOB DESCRIPTION: Roles and Responsibilities Who We Are: Jobvite offers a marketing-inspired approach to recruiting by combining the power of data and the human touch. We enable recruitment teams to personalize the candidate experience with a full-scale talent platform that accelerates and simplifies the entire talent acquisition process  from the moment the search begins to the celebration of the first promotion and beyond. We make it possible to automate communication through bot-powered texts and anticipate the employee journey with internal mobility and referral tools driven by human insight and assisted by AI. With a comprehensive, talent acquisition-focused suite Jobvite has been serving customers, including Dollar Shave Club, Dunkin Brands, OpenTable, LinkedIn, Zappos, Universal Music Group, Wayfair, Zillow & Feeding America, since 2006. What you will do:As a Software Engineer on the integration platform team, you will be entrusted with the design and development of scalable infrastructure components and applications that integrate with a wide variety of vendors. The team is responsible for creating and leveraging existing framework to enable integrations, as well as working with partners and clients on building configurable and reusable components that tightly reflect customer workflows across different applications. In this position, you will work to understand and maintain partner systems, test and verify our solutions with these systems, design and implement new integrations, and deliver product in a rapidly changing environment. Youll work with a team who gets to do things (not has to do them), obsesses over customer delight and shift left concepts, owns what they code, and is committed to shipping small and failing fast. As an engineer at Jobvite, you will have the freedom and ownership to turn your ideas into great products, in collaboration with our broader team.
